posts.title: Informative Error Handling in C
posts.description: Determining the source of a failure can be tricky if error codes are immediately passed up the stack; An "err: -1" log entry is simply not helpful. This post explores error handling with debugging in mind.

posts.title: Passing Task Parameters in FreeRTOS
posts.description: Task creation can be dangerous, especially when a task is given a parameter that points to stack memory. This post explores ways to safely pass parameters to a new task while maintaining clean and future-proof code.
